letters.description: Conduct a comprehensive assessment of the dog's health history, current diet, lifestyle, and owner's concerns and goals.
Pinpoint specific nutritional requirements, potential deficiencies, sensitivities, or imbalances based on the evaluation findings.
Develop a customized, evidence-based nutrition and feeding strategy aligned with the dog's unique biological and lifestyle needs.
Educate and empower the owner with practical guidance, ensuring confident implementation and readiness to adapt the plan as needed.
Establish strategies for ongoing monitoring, progress assessment, and sustainable optimal health, vitality, and longevity.
